decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be retained out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Location plan, RDK/MR/1433/DWG- 01 (general notes), RDK/MR/1433/DWG- 02 R2 (pre-existing and existing plans), RDK/MR/1433/DWG- 03 R3 (pre-existing and existing front and rear elevations), RDK/MR/1433/DWG- 04 R2 (pre-existing and existing flank elevations).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing dwellinghouse on site.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Single storey rear extension; front porch extension; installation of one rooflight to front roofslope; installation of one rooflight to rear roofslope (Retrospective Application)
